articles.author: Jack Horgan-Jones, Emmet Malone
articles.title: Hospitals brace for record overcrowding in new year as infections surge in State - The Irish Times
articles.description: Fresh wave of Covid-19 in China sparks renewed discussions on potential travel restrictions across Europe
articles.content:
Record overcrowding is expected in hospitals in the new year, senior Government sources believe, amid a surge of infections across Ireland.
It is expected the situation will deteriorate before the n… [+3701 chars]

articles.author: Latika Bourke
articles.title: EU splits on COVID tests for passengers from China, UK takes a wait-and-see approach - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Italy wants incoming travellers to be tested by all countries in the European Union. The UK, despite being out of it, is considering it too.
articles.content: London: The European Union has split on whether to test travellers from China for COVID-19 and the UK is reviewing the matter having taken notice of the testing requirements put in place by its ally … [+1350 chars]

articles.title: Italy urges EU peers to test China arrivals for COVID-19, but many say 'no' - CNA
articles.description: ROME/BRUSSELS: Italy on Thursday (Dec 29) urged the rest of the European Union to follow its lead and test travellers from China for COVID-19, but others said they saw no need to do so for now or were waiting for a common stance across the largely borderless …
articles.content: But earlier on Thursday, Brigitte Autran, head of the French health risk assessment committee COVARS, said: "From a scientific point of view, there is no reason at this stage to bring back controls a… [+1593 chars]
